info.name: Trackers API
info.description:
API collection for water consumption tracking operations.

## Overview

This collection covers all water tracking endpoints:

- **Add Water** - Record water consumption portions
    
- **Update Water** - Modify existing water entries
    
- **Delete Water** - Remove water consumption records
    
- **Daily Statistics** - Get today's water consumption
    
- **Monthly Statistics** - Get monthly water consumption data
